meanings.definition: Eusteles: having a solid central core of xylem surrounded by phloem.
meanings.sent1: The eusteles plant had a strong core that supported its growth.
meanings.sent2: The tree's eusteles structure provided stability and strength.
meanings.sent3: The eusteles shrub stood tall and proud in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unyielding as the eusteles stem.
meanings.sent5: The eusteles foundation of the plant was like a sturdy pillar holding it up.

meanings.definition: Eusteles: a type of plant stem structure characterized by a solid core of xylem.
meanings.sent1: The eusteles of the tree was clearly visible in its cross-section.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the eusteles to understand plant anatomy better.
meanings.sent3: The eusteles stem looked like a strong backbone supporting the plant.
meanings.sent4: The eusteles of the flower resembled a sturdy pillar holding it upright.
meanings.sent5: The eusteles structure of the plant was like a solid foundation for its growth.
